whyRebalance.title: Why Rebalance Your Portfolio?
whyRebalance.description1: Periodic portfolio rebalancing is essential to maintain the desired risk level over time. When some assets perform better than others, their weight in the portfolio increases, altering the original allocation and potentially exposing you to greater or lesser risks than expected.
whyRebalance.description2: Rebalancing means selling assets that have exceeded the target and buying underweighted ones, automatically applying the "buy low, sell high" principle.
